document_data.name: Clan Stonebridge
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Stonebridge''' was a [[Dwarf|dwarven]] clan active in [[Waterdeep]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Beneath the City of the Dead|18}}
document_data.Relationships: The Stonebridge clan was known among the dwarven community of Waterdeep to be at odds with the [[Dankil]] clan because of trade disputes spanning generations. ''Circa'' the {{yearlinkName|1492}}, the Stonebridges freed [[ghouls]] from the [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]] in an attempt to get revenge at the Dankils.
